title: Update HttpClient version to 4.5.6
description:
There is another maintenance release of HttpClient 4.x now out, 4.5.6, including several bug fixes. 

HttpClient 4.5.6, Http Core 4.4.10, Http Mime 4.5.6

http://www.apache.org/dist/httpcomponents/httpclient/RELEASE_NOTES-4.5.x.txt

http://www.apache.org/dist/httpcomponents/httpcore/RELEASE_NOTES-4.4.x.txt

comments.content: Patch passes precommit. Have not run the full test suite yet.
comments.author: Michael Braun
